docs.lead_paragraph: ''Open wide. A little wider, please. Very good. Now say 'cheese.' '' The first part will sound familiar to virtually anyone who has sat in a dentist's chair, but probably not the second. That may change if a new technique proves effective. The procedure seeks to spot incipient cavities using high intensity light and a tiny camera.
docs.abstract: New procedure to spot incipient cavities uses high-intensity light and tiny camera (S)
